tool_description: Validates that resume language, terminology, and phrasing align with industry standards and professional conventions for the target field.

resume_content.description: Resume content to validate for industry language

target_industry.description: Target industry: technology, healthcare, finance, education, manufacturing, retail, consulting, legal, marketing, or other

job_level.description: Target job level: entry, mid, senior, executive

validation_strictness.description: Validation level: lenient, standard, or strict

error_messages: Empty resume content: Provide resume text for industry language validation.
Invalid target industry: Use one of [technology, healthcare, finance, education, manufacturing, retail, consulting, legal, marketing, other].
Invalid job level: Use one of [entry, mid, senior, executive].
Invalid validation strictness: Use one of [lenient, standard, strict].
Insufficient content: Resume content too brief for meaningful industry language analysis.
usage: Provide resume content and specify target industry, optionally set job level and validation strictness. The tool evaluates language appropriateness and suggests improvements.

industry_alignment.description: Overall alignment assessment: poor, fair, good, excellent

terminology_issues.description: Terminology that doesn't align with industry standards

missing_industry_terms.description: Important industry terms that could be incorporated

tone_assessment.description: Professional tone evaluation: too_casual, appropriate, too_formal
